name: Swing Master 3000 VR
description:
Endless runner in VR.

Just imagine it.
You and your trusted webs. The only thing you can do is run (or swing...) forward.
Kind of like your life, you can try to run, but is it even worth it?

Hello guys, my name is Sir Fansi and I make a new VR game every week, so feel free to check this one out and let me know what you think! If you wanna keep up with what I am doing: https://www.instagram.com/sir_fansi/
